page.title: 12Entertainment in Rishton
page.content: The general opinion is that there is not much entertainment in Rishton. Most people go out of the town for their entertainment. Once a year there is a big fun day where there are stalls, music and other entertainment for all the family. This is well supported. For young people there are youth clubs but for older people there are only pubs and clubs for entertainment. Most people stop at home and do such things as watching T.V. and doing crafts. Other people enjoy visiting their friends. There are a few spectator sports such as bowls, football and netball, Clayton Harriers and Rishton Cricket Club. The cricket club in Rishton has a very good reputation.
